text: @RealJamesWoods Pennsylvania is even worse with 70% of all deaths occurred in nursing homes to which @GovernorTomWolf consciously forced Covid-19 elderly back into the nursing homes. BTW, we had plenty of capacity in our OA hospitals statewide! #Impeachwolf
